name: CASE_CHARGE
description: The CASE_CHARGE table allows you to report on charges associated with cases in the Chronic Disease Case Management module.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the charges associated with this case record.

columns.name: CHARGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the charge record.
